definition: fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
fellow countryman (from the same village)/the folks back home

sentences.english: Welcome to the real world, folks.
sentences.chinese: 乡亲父老，欢迎来到现实世界。

sentences.english: The relatives of the millet is gone, the villagers from back home.
sentences.chinese: 亲戚的谷子没了，乡亲们再从家里背来。

sentences.english: All products are purchased from acquaintance fellow villagers so that products have high quality.
sentences.chinese: 所有产品收购于邻近相识的父老乡亲，品质有保障。

sentences.english: From the coast of Mazu, you can actually see the villager walking on the opposite side.
sentences.chinese: 从马祖的海岸，你其实看得见对面行走的乡亲。

sentences.english: Driven beyond endurance, they led the villagers to arm themselves and prepare for action.
sentences.chinese: 他们忍无可忍，领导乡亲们拿起武器准备行动。

sentences.english: She told fellow villagers, the back is looking for help factory workers.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉乡亲们，此次回来是帮工厂找工的。

sentences.english: Hereby he is presenting the fellows in Northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 在这里他向我们呈现的是东北的父老乡亲。

sentences.english: The preserved ham made by the local farmers is from the farm pigs which called "field fat".
sentences.chinese: 乡亲们做腊肉用的猪，就是被当地称为地油子的土猪。

sentences.english: When Sun Shan arrived home, all the villagers came to congratulate him.
sentences.chinese: 孙山回家后，乡亲们都来看他，向他祝贺。

sentences.english: Thanks to those guys who have ever supported me and my family. Thanks indeed.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢各位父老乡亲对我的关心和支持。

sentences.english: Uruguay lived up to its reputation and delighted the home fans by disposing of one team after another.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭队不负众望过关斩将，乡亲们都非常高兴。

sentences.english: The college man expected to get a warm welcome from the villagers.
sentences.chinese: 上大学的人都希望得到乡亲的热情欢迎。

sentences.english: But he wanted to see the old folk again and to visit my mother's grave.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他想看一看家乡父老乡亲，为我的母亲扫墓。

sentences.english: He's come back to the village to see us folks.
sentences.chinese: 他回村看望乡亲们来了。
乡亲们买了爸爸的家具。

sentences.english: But folks, don't think this is an original Bollywood flick.
sentences.chinese: 但乡亲，不觉得这是一种原宝莱坞电影。

definition: villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
another part of the country/some other place
fellow townsman/fellow villager/sb from the same hometown
